document_data.name: Merlar
document_data.deathnotes: [[Mirtul 5]]; casualty on raid looking for [[Elminster Aumar]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Merlar''' was a [[highknight]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Per the intelligence [[Storm Silverhand]] had, Merlar was a widely liked, amiable youngling.
document_data.Relationships: He had been trained by [[Ilvellund Nordroun]], who was also his team leader in his last raid. Other members of his team were [[Daerlund]], a fellow highknight, and the [[War Wizard]] [[Hondryn]].
document_data.History:
Merlar participated in the raid on [[Tethgard]] on [[Mirtul 5]] in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|15-17|1}} after the fugitive [[Elminster Aumar]] stole the ''[[Royal Gorget of Battle]]'' from the Royal Palace in [[Suzail]].

He was not named among the known survivors later.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|41|3}}
